father: Pieter Meintjies VAN DEN BERG, De Oude
source: Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Graaff-Reinet, Baptism register, 1792-1805, page 225, entry number 1813. Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch. Transcribed by Cornel Viljoen, with consent of the NGK Archives, from Family Search Film # 008121018, image number 166.
searchParameters: Father with van den berg anywhere in the surname with pieter meintjies anywhere in the first name in all the registers.
